comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200409070800

  I can create new runtime workbench launch configuration.
  But I can not nor open my old launch configurations, nor edit recently added
ones, even just created (may be in previous Eclipse session). I can launch these
configurations, but then I have problems with opening classes from console
exception stack  trace.
